links.description: Writer/director Johnson paid tribute to some of the classic con capers from the 50s in The Brothers Bloom. Alongside Weisz, Japanese actress Rinko Kikuchi played Bang Bang: an explosives-loving associate of the brothers. Kikuchi played the title character in Kumiko, The Treasure Hunter.
